mapper.update: update bd_check_score set crid = #{crid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tableid = #{tableid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, itemid = #{itemid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, kf = #{kf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, kfyy = #{kfyy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, df = #{df,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flag = #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where scoreid = #{scoreid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select scoreid, crid, tableid, itemid, kf, kfyy, df, create_by, date_format(create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') create_date, update_by, date_format(update_date, '%Y/%m/%d') update_date, remarks, flag from bd_check_score where scoreid = #{scoreid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select scoreid, crid, tableid, itemid, kf, kfyy, df, create_by, date_format(create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') create_date, update_by, date_format(update_date, '%Y/%m/%d') update_date, remarks, flag from bd_check_score
